Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Misadventures and the Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's farcical drowning and the subsequent debt accusation, highlighting Guz's deceptive nature and Alley's reactions.

sub_scenes.title: The Drowning Deception
sub_scenes.description: King Guz's staged drowning leads to a rescue by Alley, followed by an immediate and suspicious shift to a debt accusation.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Dinosaur Dilemma and the New Dino Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Bronto's strange behavior, the diagnosis, the decision to trade him in, the visit to the dealership, the test drive and the purchase of a new dinosaur, Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Bumping Issue
sub_scenes.description: Bronto's odd behavior of bumping into trees is introduced and discussed, leading to a diagnosis of old age.

sub_scenes.title: The Dinosaur Dealership
sub_scenes.description: The idea of trading in Bronto is proposed, leading Alley to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership where he considers a new, smaller dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

Major_Arcs.title: The Unsuccessful Dinosaur Sale and Dinny's Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details an attempt to sell a dinosaur, a test ride gone wrong, revealing the rider's identity as Dinny, and Dinny's subsequent mistreatment and escape.

sub_scenes.title: Faulty Dinosaur Sales
sub_scenes.description: A dinosaur sales pitch leads to a bumpy test ride, revealing a surprising identity twist when the rider falls off.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated and harassed, leading to his escape and a chase involving children.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Mishaps with Cooola
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley's attempt to invite Cooola fishing, her rejection, their argument, and the bizarre rock-falling incident, highlighting their strained relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Rejection and Argument
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Cooola fishing, but her rejection leads to an argument about Alley taking her for granted and a strange, sudden consequence.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Troubles and Romantic Rivalry
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes fishing-related complaints, a noise disturbance, and a developing romantic rivalry involving Oola and another man's woman.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Noise Complaint
sub_scenes.description: Fishermen complain about noise, tracing it to a noisy baiting caveman, leading to a confrontation and a request for silence.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Courtship
sub_scenes.description: A romantic rivalry emerges as Oola is suspected of courting another man's woman, leading to observation and eventual confirmation of his advances.

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy, Romance Lessons, and Comic Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses a jealous outburst and fight, a friend's advice on romance, and the muscular caveman's disastrous attempts to apply romantic techniques, leading to comedic backfires.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Fight and Romantic Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman attacks a redhead, but the woman's affection is clearly for the redhead, leading to the jealous caveman's rejection.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Strategy and Failure
sub_scenes.description: The rejected caveman gets advice on romance, attempts to mimic romantic gestures, but his efforts comically backfire.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Finger Bite
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals the muscular man's past jealousy, leading to a present-day humorous finger-biting incident misinterpreted as cannibalism.

Major_Arcs.title: Marital Troubles and New Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details various marital disputes, a woman confronting a cheating man, and a developing new romantic interest for Alley.

sub_scenes.title: Scenes of Marital Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Several panels depict different marital disputes, including accusations of infidelity and physical retaliation by women.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Turn
sub_scenes.description: Oola seeks forgiveness, leading Alley to decide to become more romantic and demonstrate his newfound romantic skills.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Men's Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Two fishing men express confusion and annoyance regarding women, providing a humorous commentary on the preceding romantic scenes.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the new 'Twist' dance craze, its dangerous nature leading to injuries, social pressure to participate, and ultimately, a dance performance with unexpected hospitalizations.

sub_scenes.title: The Perils of the Twist
sub_scenes.description: The 'Twist' dance is introduced as dangerous, causing injuries, and prompting commentary on older generations attempting it.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons, leading to a clumsy session and a humorous reveal of the instructor's true identity.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Performance
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop performs 'the twitch', facing mockery, but the real comedic twist is the audience getting injured from just watching.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Detour
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves scholars using time travel to research 16th-century Spain, but their caveman envoy, Alley-Oop, gets sidetracked by romance.

sub_scenes.title: The Time Travel Plan
sub_scenes.description: Scholars devise a plan to use a time machine and Alley-Oop to gather firsthand information on ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Unexpected Time Travel and Spain Mission
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop's kiss attempt is interrupted by time travel due to another scientist's machine, leading to a mission in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation
Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

Major_Arcs.title: Bullfighting Blunder and Romantic Rejection in Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Alley-Oop and Wonmug's arrival in Spain, Alley-Oop's disastrous serenade attempt leading to attacking a famous matador, and unexpectedly becoming a bullfighter himself with unconventional methods, only to return home to face romantic rejection.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade and Matador Attack
sub_scenes.description: Arrival in Spain leads to Alley-Oop attempting a serenade, which ends in him attacking a famous matador, Don Jose.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfighting Success
sub_scenes.description: Don Jose's incapacitation leads to Alley-Oop becoming a bullfighter, using a hammer to unconventional but successful effect.

sub_scenes.title: Return and Romantic Trouble
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop returns from Spain, anticipating a kiss for his bravery, but faces jealousy and rejection due to a misplaced hair.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

Major_Arcs.title: The Absurdity of Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the theme of kingship through the 'King for a Day' concept, showcasing the perceived ease, the reality of misinterpretations of royal commands, and the general unpleasantness of being king.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Misunderstood Respect
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, leading to a temporary kingship and a darkly humorous misunderstanding of 'respect'.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Domestic Kingship Troubles
sub_scenes.description: King Guz, as temporary king, faces domestic troubles with Queen Oompa, highlighting the unpleasant realities of even temporary kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

sub_scenes.title: King's Day of Disputes
sub_scenes.description: The king deals with various disputes throughout his day, including a clam ownership argument and financial frustrations, showing the constant demands of kingship.

sub_scenes.title: King's Troubles Continue
sub_scenes.description: The king's day worsens with outdoor brawls, financial disagreements with advisors, and displeasure with his ulcer-aggravating dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Diet and Royal Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: The king's ulcer diet is enforced, leading to reflection on his job and a violent outburst against a playful servant, highlighting the burdens and temperament of kingship.

Major_Arcs.title: Brief Scenes of Everyday Caveman Life
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contains a collection of short, disparate scenes depicting various aspects of everyday caveman life, from workplace accidents to romantic prophecies and time machine mishaps.

sub_scenes.title: Workplace Apology and Ex-Ruler's Relief
sub_scenes.description: Two scenes depict a workplace apology and a caveman's relief at relinquishing rulership, offering glimpses into caveman society.

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Offer and Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: Two more scenes feature a ruler offer and a bizarre measurement involving a 'Strange Duck', showcasing the variety of caveman activities.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy and Forced Shaving
sub_scenes.description: A romantic prophecy leads to a 'handsome stranger' being forcefully shaved, a humorous and unexpected consequence of romance.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Mishap
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment to bring 'Oop' to the present goes awry, resulting in a Roman soldier appearing and the machine malfunctioning.
